title: Gift Nidalee
body: Can someone gift me nidalee{{champion:76}} I've played her once and loved her playstyle and I got challenger skin in a chest for her but I'm young and can't afford RP to buy her and I generally lose games so only get around 50 IP which would take forever to get her and I am aware that she is pretty cheap but still takes a long time thanks

replies.body:
https://s3.postimg.org/kwas5m6z7/sheriff_in_town.jpg

Grinding is fairly forgiving in League.

> [{quoted}](name=Bradilz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zF7TKWMU,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-16T00:36:00.085+0000)
>
>  I am young and can't afford RP to buy her 

And that's how the world works. If someone did get her for you they would be robbing you of a valuable lesson.
